media:group.media:title: Are Esports Crowds an Issue?
media:group.media:description:
#shorts #gaming #esports 

The fans at the Rio Major are so fucking bonkers that they would make soccer fans blush but the fans being this hype also brings on a problem.


Writen and hosted by: Devin Coull
Edited by: Rotimi Adelakun
Produced by: Kai Medalla
